summary: This is a calendar invitation/email for a Skype meeting titled 'Epstein Estate' scheduled for November 9, 2020, from 4:30 PM to 5:00 PM Eastern Time. The meeting was organized by Marc A. Weinstein and included Andrew Tomback as an attendee, suggesting a discussion related to the administration of Jeffrey Epstein's estate.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.context: Organized a Skype meeting titled 'Epstein Estate' and sent the calendar invitation to himself and Andrew Tomback.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: Listed as an attendee on the calendar invitation for the 'Epstein Estate' meeting organized by Marc A. Weinstein.

connections.description: Both were scheduled participants in a professional meeting concerning the Epstein Estate.

events.title: Epstein Estate Meeting
events.description: A scheduled Skype meeting to discuss matters related to the Epstein Estate.

keyFacts: A meeting titled 'Epstein Estate' was scheduled via Skype for November 9, 2020.
Marc A. Weinstein organized the meeting and Andrew Tomback was an attendee.
The document is a calendar invitation/email, indicating ongoing administrative or legal work related to Epstein's estate over a year after his death.
